info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 25 at 3:32PM MST until August 25 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
info.description:
FFWPSR
The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Western Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... Southeastern Imperial County in southeastern California...
* Until 730 PM MST /730 PM PDT/.
* At 332 PM MST /332 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Yuma, Andrade, Algodones Dunes, Winterhaven and Gordon's Well.
This includes CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 74 and 85.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 7:30 PM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 7:30 PM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 7:30 PM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 7:30 PM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
